data.heading: Blockchain Introduction
description: Blockchain has been in a lot of Buzzword these days. And thats mainly because itâ€™s backbone behind one of the very famous crypto-currency in the world - the Bitcoin.
Blockchain is the algorithm for Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT ).

DLT and Blockchain as a concept can be used in varied applications beyond crypto-currency network like, Real estate, logistics, Banking and Financial Sector, Fin-Tech and elections & surveys. And the list is endless and expanding daily.
